This is the Projects page for Simón Calle Laverde - Portfolio 2021 - Modern Web & Design

Some projects
I worked on over the past years

Some
projects I
worked on
through
the past
years

Hi there!

I’m showcasing a bunch of projects I had the opportunity to work on in the past years.

The first two projects are some experimental which I worked recently (during those pandemic times) as independent doing UI design and development completely.

I worked with the great team of Code Nation, a five star rated digital and creative agency headquartered in Australia for over 4 years; we developed dozens of awesome websites and campaigning platforms for clients and organizations around the world, both onsite and remotely, helping in some political and environmental cases and issues around the world.

We were doing this online thing before it was cool, working 2 years remotely and meeting sometimes in Colombia and/or Australia.

Hi there!

I’m showcasing a bunch of projects I had the opportunity to work on in the past years.

The first two projects are some experimental which I worked recently (during those pandemic times) as independent doing UI design and development completely.

I worked with the great team of Code Nation, a five star rated digital and creative agency headquartered in Australia for over 4 years; we developed dozens of awesome websites and campaigning platforms for clients and organizations around the world, both onsite and remotely, helping in some political and environmental cases and issues around the world.

We were doing this online thing before it was cool, working 2 years remotely and meeting sometimes in Colombia and/or Australia.

Disclaimer

Disclaimer

Most of the projects displayed between 2015 to 2019 are those which I worked as a team member mostly in the development phase, starting from a base design that I used to receive and a base template that we iterated on, and are those in which I personally worked at the time at least over half (50%) or most (90% or even 100%) of the whole development. Some sites may have or may have had new changes, small edits, or further additions by Code Nation's team or by the clients themselves through their CMS over the years. Many may remain intact for years. Others may end their life.
Still the first "above-the-fold" screenshot for each original website remains here together with a "thumbnail" for their main image.
The majority of projects displayed in this site were developed for many clients around the world. Images are just used to display and link to its corresponding project in which we put our hearts developing; all original material or third party trademarks or images referenced here remain the property of each client or their respective owners, so material is only used for each corresponding case study, with the purpose of showcasing projects and work in a healthy modern portfolio environment, and intended to constitute fair use.

My most recent adventures

My most recent adventures

At the beginning of 2021 I went a bit "hippie" and went almost leaving to my farm for some months, were I also started improving my JavaScript and learning React. In the second half I bought a car, fixed problems in my live, and started learning Next.js. I also worked for someone in the USA (Instituto De Negocios) who spent on me to learn a lot of LinkedIn Ads and some social media digital marketing and campaigning, taking some courses first and reading lots of documentation, atteding webinars, and more to then pop some campaigns in November and December. I taught them all what I learned, tips and tricks I was suggested, and we finally reached the point to gain about 500+ followers more and enable "Live Videos" which they wanted to be able to stream from now on.

My most recent goals

My most recent goals

Now, I want to continue helping businesses put their names out there with branding, marketing, good design, and high quality websites that reflect their passion. I'm now very passionate in interactive and digital design to be able to bring brands to live through an awesome online presence that breaks the common rules of the web and let them communicate exactly what they want, with hand-crafted designs and great user experience.
